be.haraka.game4.Graphics

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.haraka.game4.Graphics.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Camera manager class. Will update the camera position, set the projection matrix to the batch, and act on zoom in, zoom out. If the camera is locked, it will simply follow the player.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float deltaTime,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                   ObjectInstance localPlayer)
        Update method, called on game loop. Will update the position and set the projection view matrix to the batch. localPlayer instance is also given to make the camera follow the player.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime, - elapsed time since last loop.
        batch, - LibGDX batch used fot opengl as a render layer.
        localPlayer, - local player gameobject istance.

      • toggleLock

        public void toggleLock()
        Toggles the camera lock on the player.

      • zoomIn

        public void zoomIn()
        Zooms in. Maxium and minimum values are set as constants.

      • zoomOut

        public void zoomOut()
        Zooms out. Maximum and minimum values are set as constants.
